REMOTE LIBRARIES¶

Note

This page Contains Python Library Definitions For Remote Libraries

WinMuConnect¶

class common.tools.remote.WinMuConnect.WinMuConnect¶

Bases: object

connect_enterprise_network(ssid)¶
  • Assuming that profile is already created for the network with stored user name and password
  • Refer cw_automation/testsuites/xiq/config/enterprise_wlan_profile_creation.docx for creation of profile
  • This keyword is used with robot remote server
  • start the remote server in windows MU
  • For starting remote server refer “cw_automation/testsuites/xiq/config/remote_server_config.txt”
  • Include below library in test suite robot file
  • Library    Remote  http://${MU1_IP}:${MU1_REMOTE_PORT}   WITH NAME   MU1
  • Keyword Usage:
  • MU1.Connect Enterprise Network   ${SSID}
Parameters:ssid – name of the ssid to connect
Returns:1 for connected else -1
connect_open_network(ssid)¶
  • Connect MU to open ssid
  • This keyword is used with robot remote server
  • start the remote server in windows MU
  • For starting remote server refer “cw_automation/testsuites/xiq/config/remote_server_config.txt”
  • Include below library in test suite robot file
  • Library    Remote  http://${MU1_IP}:${MU1_REMOTE_PORT}   WITH NAME   MU1
  • Keyword Usage:
  • MU1.Connect Open Network   ${SSID}
Parameters:ssid – ssid name
Returns:1 for connected else -1
connect_wpa2_ppsk_network(ssid, key, retry_count=5)¶
  • Connect the wpa2 ppsk network
  • This keyword is used with robot remote server
  • start the remote server in windows MU
  • For starting remote server refer “cw_automation/testsuites/xiq/config/remote_server_config.txt”
  • Include below library in test suite robot file
  • Library    Remote  http://${MU1_IP}:${MU1_REMOTE_PORT}   WITH NAME   MU1
  • Keyword Usage:
  • MU1.Connect Wpa2 Ppsk Network   ${SSID}   ${PSK_KEY}
Parameters:
  • ssid – name of the ssid to connect
  • key – password for connection
  • retry_count – Retry count to connect the ppsk network
Returns:

1 for connected else -1
connect_wpa2_psk_network(ssid, key)¶
  • Connect the wpa2 psk network
  • This keyword is used with robot remote server
  • start the remote server in windows MU
  • For starting remote server refer “cw_automation/testsuites/xiq/config/remote_server_config.txt”
  • Include below library in test suite robot file
  • Library    Remote  http://${MU1_IP}:${MU1_REMOTE_PORT}   WITH NAME   MU1
  • Keyword Usage:
  • MU1.Connect Wpa2 Psk Network   ${SSID}   ${PSK_KEY}
Parameters:
  • ssid – name of the ssid to connect
  • key – password for connection
Returns:

1 for connected else -1
connect_wpa3_psk_network(ssid, key)¶
  • Connect the wpa3 psk network
  • This keyword is used with robot remote server
  • start the remote server in windows MU
  • For starting remote server refer “cw_automation/testsuites/xiq/config/remote_server_config.txt”
  • Include below library in test suite robot file
  • Library    Remote  http://${MU1_IP}:${MU1_REMOTE_PORT}   WITH NAME   MU1
  • Keyword Usage:
  • MU1.Connect Wpa3 Psk Network   ${SSID}   ${PSK_KEY}
Parameters:
  • ssid – name of the ssid to connect
  • key – password for connection
Returns:

1 for connected else -1
connectivity_check(destination='https://www.facebook.com/')¶
  • Connectivity check using curl
  • Keyword Usage:
  • MU1.Connectivity Check
Parameters:destination – destination url
Returns:1 if internet access available else -1
delete_wlan_profile(profile)¶
  • Delete network profile
  • Keyword Usage:
  • MU1.Delete Wlan Profile   ${WLAN_PROFILE_NAME}
Parameters:profile – profile name
Returns:1 if deleted else None
disconnect_wifi()¶
  • Disconnect to the Wi-Fi Network
  • Keyword Usage:
  • MU1.Disconnect Wifi
Returns:1 if disconnected else -1
get_wi_fi_interface_ip_address()¶
  • Get IP Address Assigned to the Wi-Fi Interface
  • Keyword Usage:
  • MU1.Get Wi Fi Interface Ip Address
Returns:wlan interface Ip Address
ping_check(destination)¶
  • Ping the destination address
  • Keyword Usage:
  • Ping Check   ${DESTINATION}
  • Ping Check  www.google.com
Parameters:destination – destination address ex www.google.com
Returns:1 if ping success else -1

Recording¶

class common.tools.remote.Recording.Recording¶

Bases: object

start_video_recording(_file_name)¶

Starts video recording for test execution and saves recoding in file :param _file_name: File name where recording has to be stored :return:

stop_video_recording()¶

Stops video recording

LinMuConnect¶

class common.tools.remote.LinMuConnect.LinMuConnect¶

Bases: object

connect_open_network(ssid)¶

Connects open authentication network :param ssid: name of the ssid to connect :return: 1 if success

connect_psk_network(ssid=None, key=None)¶

Connects to psk network :param ssid: ssid :param key: ssid keys :return: none

disconnect_wi_fi()¶

Disconnects from wi-fi :return:

static execute_commands(cmd)¶

Execute command on windows command line using subprocess module :param cmd: command to execute :return: cmd_out of the command

get_dhcp_ip¶

Gets DHCP IP :return:

get_wi_fi_interface_ip_address¶

Gets WiFi Interface IP addresss :return:

search_network(ssid, interface)¶

This keyword search for network :param ssid: name of the ssid to scan :param interface: name of the wlan interface :return: 1 if success
